para: Data management tools are concerned with the location, transfer, and management of distributed data, as described in Data Management: Key Concepts.

GT &shortversion;'s primary data management tools are:
GridFTP for high-performance and reliable data transport Reliable File Transfer (RFT) service for managing multiple transfers Replica Location Service (RLS) for maintaining location information for replicated files

In addition, GT &shortversion; provides tech preview versions of OGSA Data Access and Integration (OGSA-DAI) for accessing and integrated structured and semistructured data, and a Data Replication Service (DRS).
